text: The Lipova is a left tributary of the river Tutova in Romania. It flows into the Tutova in Dragomirești. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice - județul Bacău * Trasee turistice - județul Vaslui Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Bacău County Category:Rivers of Vaslui County
title: Lipova (river)
